amendment.description: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to call on the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to develop a standard of hospice care tailored to the unique needs of combat veterans, including Vietnam-era veterans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (OH) amendment (A054) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Johnson (OH).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (OH) amendment (A054) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
